verses.verse: Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O <S%H6135>barren<s%>, thou that didst not <S%H3205>bear<s%>; break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, and cry <S%H6670>aloud<s%>, thou that didst not travail with <S%H2342>child<s%>: for <S%H7227>more<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> than the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the married <S%H1166>wife<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Enlarge <S%H7337><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of thy <S%H168>tent<s%>, and let them stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of thy <S%H4908>habitations<s%>; <S%H2820>spare<s%> <S%H748>not<s%>: lengthen thy <S%H4340>cords<s%>, and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> thy <S%H3489>stakes<s%>.

For thou shalt spread <S%H6555>abroad<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left<s%>; and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and make the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>.

Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H954>not<s%>; for thou shalt not be ashamed: neither be thou <S%H3637>confounded<s%>; for thou shalt not be put to <S%H2659>shame<s%>: for thou shalt <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1322>shame<s%> of thy <S%H5934>youth<s%>; and the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of thy <S%H491>widowhood<s%> shalt thou remember no <S%H2142>more<s%>.

For thy <S%H6213>Maker<s%> is thy <S%H1166>husband<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>: and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>; the <S%H430>God<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> shall he be <S%H7121>called<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H7121>called<s%> thee as a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, even a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5271>youth<s%>, when she is cast <S%H3988>off<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
For a <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%> have I <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H1419>thee<s%>; but with great <S%H7356>mercies<s%> will I gather <S%H6908>thee<s%>.

In <S%H8241>overflowing<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from thee for a <S%H7281>moment<s%>; but with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will I have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H559>thee<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>.

For this is as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> unto <S%H7650>me<s%>; for as I have sworn that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> shall no more go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, so have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> that I will not be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with <S%H1605>thee<s%>, nor rebuke thee.

For the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> may <S%H4185>depart<s%>, and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> be <S%H4131>removed<s%>; but my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from <S%H1285>thee<s%>, neither shall my covenant of <S%H7965>peace<s%> be <S%H4131>removed<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that hath mercy on <S%H7355>thee<s%>.

O thou <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>, tossed with <S%H5590>tempest<s%>, and not <S%H5162>comforted<s%>, <S%H7257>behold<s%>, I will set thy <S%H68>stones<s%> in fair <S%H6320>colors<s%>, and lay thy <S%H3245>foundations<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H8121>pinnacles<s%> of <S%H3539>rubies<s%>, and thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H68>carbuncles<s%>, and all thy <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2656>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>.
And all thy <S%H1121>children<s%> shall be <S%H3928>taught<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and <S%H7227>great<s%> shall be the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of thy <S%H1121>children<s%>.

In <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shalt thou be <S%H3559>established<s%>: thou shalt be <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H6233>oppression<s%>, for thou shalt not <S%H3372>fear<s%>; and from <S%H4288>terror<s%>, for it shall not come near <S%H7126>thee<s%>.
Behold <S%H1481><s%>, they may gather <S%H1481>together<s%>, but <S%H657>not<s%> by <S%H4310>me<s%>: whosoever shall gather <S%H1481>together<s%> against thee shall fall because of <S%H5307>thee<s%>.

Behold <S%H1254><s%>, I have created the <S%H2796>smith<s%> that <S%H5301>bloweth<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6352>coals<s%>, and bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H3627>weapon<s%> for his <S%H4639>work<s%>; and I have <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H7843>waster<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy<s%>.

No <S%H3627>weapon<s%> that is <S%H3335>formed<s%> against thee shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%>; and every <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> against thee in <S%H4941>judgment<s%> thou shalt <S%H7561>condemn<s%>. This is the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and their <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> which is of <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
